alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 29 at 10:19PM MDT until October 30 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. * WHERE...Lower Washington County and Zion National Park. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Lower Washington County; Zion National Park
